tool_description: This API generates customizable QR codes using Python. Users can customize the size, border, fill color, background color, style, and logo of the QR code by passing parameters in the URL. The API uses the qrcode and Pillow libraries to generate and style the QR code image, and then returns the result as a PNG file.
name: Customizeable QR Code Generator
title: Customizeable QR Code Generator

api_list.name: logo_scale
api_list.description: The scale of the logo relative to the QR code size (default is 0.15).
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://customizeable-qr-code-generator.p.rapidapi.com/"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "customizeable-qr-code-generator.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: style
api_list.description: The style of the QR code. Accepts "normal" for standard square boxes or "rounded" for rounded corners (default is "normal").
api_list.code:
